verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: has] stopped an Obama - era rule requiring large companies to report how much they pay workers by race and gender .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] has [V: stopped] [ARG1: an Obama - era rule requiring large companies to report how much they pay workers by race and gender] .
The Trump administration has stopped [ARG0: an Obama - era rule] [V: requiring] [ARG2: large companies] [ARG1: to report how much they pay workers by race and gender] .
The Trump administration has stopped an Obama - era rule requiring [ARG0: large companies] to [V: report] [ARG1: how much they pay workers by race and gender] .
The Trump administration has stopped an Obama - era rule requiring large companies to report [ARG1: how much] [ARG0: they] [V: pay] [ARG2: workers] [ARGM-MNR: by race and gender] .
